alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 24 at 6:46AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT... * WHAT...SURF UP TO 10 TO 13 FEET. * WHERE...SOUTHERN AND EASTERN SHORES OF ALL ISLANDS. * WHEN...THROUGH SUNDAY. * IMPACTS...MINOR...EXPECT SOME STRONG BREAKING WAVES, SHOREBREAK, AND STRONG LONGSHORE AND RIP CURRENTS MAKING WATER RECREATION DIFFICULT AND DANGEROUS. SOME COASTAL EROSION IS ALSO POSSIBLE FOR VULNERABLE LOCATIONS. LARGER SET WAVES MAY OCCASIONALLY IMPACT HARBOR ENTRANCES. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS: BEACHGOERS, SWIMMERS, AND SURFERS SHOULD HEED ALL ADVICE GIVEN BY SAFETY OFFICIALS AND EXERCISE CAUTION. && Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 646 TAEAO ASO TOANA`I SETEMA 24 2022 ...O LOO FAAAUAU FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA... * MAFUAAGA...O GALU MAUALULUGA MA MALOLOSI E 10 I LE 13 FUTU. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E AAFIA AI TALAFATAI I SAUTE MA SASAE O MOTU UMA O LE ATUNU`U. * TAIMI...SEIA OO I LE ASO SA. * AAFIAGA...LAITI...O LE A IAI TAIMI E FAFATI MAUALULUGA AI GALU I LE MATAFAGA MA LE AAU, E AAVE FOI LE SAMI E FAAFAIGATA MA E LAMATIA AI FUAFUAGA TUMATAFAGA. E ONO TUTUPU FOI NAI SOLOGA I TALAFATAI O LE ATUNUU. E IAI FOI TAIMI, E ONO FAFATI AI GALU I LE MULIAVA(GUTU) O LE UAFU. PUIPUIGA/TAPENAGA FAATINO: TAGATA UMA O LOO TAFAFAO I LE MATAFAGA, AUAU, FA`APEA LE `AU FA`ASE`E I GALU, E TATAU ONA FA`AUTAGIAINA FAUTUAGA UMA E AUMAIA E TAGATA O LOO PUIPUIA LE SAOGALEMU MA IA FAATINOINA MA LE FAAETEETE.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
